workflow.title: A Purely Digital Workflow
workflow.subtitle: From scan to product. Controlled precision at every stage.

retainers.title: Retention Splints
retainers.description: Digitally designed retainers ensuring full control over the insertion path and seating stability. Based on 3D scans, allowing for precise management of geometry, thickness, and retention zones – unattainable with traditional thermoforming methods.
features: Significantly higher durability than thermoformed splints

guards.title: Occlusal Splints
guards.description: Occlusal splints designed for protection against bruxism. Variable material thickness – 2mm in occlusal zones, 1mm in unloaded areas. Significantly higher material and structural strength compared to traditional thermoforming methods.
features: Multi-fold higher durability than traditional methods

aligners.title: Whitening Trays
aligners.description: Individually designed whitening trays based on 3D scans. Precise adaptation to patient anatomy with controlled thickness for comfort and predictability of whitening results.

fixedRetainer.title: Printed Fixed Retainer
fixedRetainer.description: Digitally designed fixed retention made using 3D printing technology with biocompatible medical resin. Unlike traditional wires bent by hand on a model, our method ensures ultra-precise fit, predictable strength, and full repeatability.
features: Elimination of manual wire bending errors

injection.title: Injection Stamp System
injection.description: A digital system for Class I cavity restoration, based on a pre-preparation scan. The 3D printed mold allows for flowable composite injection and 1:1 anatomy restoration as an alternative to ceramic inlays.

precision.title: 1:1 Replication
precision.desc: Precise reconstruction of anatomy from pre-op data

time.title: Minimal Steps
time.desc: Simplified clinical protocol with no lab phase

workflow.title: Digital Control
workflow.desc: Predictable result thanks to CAD/CAM design

technology.title: Technology
technology.description: We utilize advanced 3D printing and digital design technologies to create precise dental solutions from scan data.

contact.title: Start Cooperation
contact.subtitle: Contact us to learn more about our solutions.

company.title: About Us
company.description: A digital dental laboratory specializing in precise 3D printing.

footer.copyright: APM Digital Dental Lab. All rights reserved.

software.title: Next-generation CAD/CAM
software.subtitle: for digital dentistry
software.vision: We are working on the next generation of CAD/CAM software, designed from the ground up for modern digital dentistry. Not as another interface layer — but as a new engine.

why.title: Why a new system?
why.description: Today's CAD/CAM solutions were built over a decade ago. They are stable and proven — but technologically based on an architecture not designed for AI or GPUs.
why.new: A system that understands tooth anatomy

anatomy.title: Digital Anatomy
anatomy.desc: Analysis of shape, structure, and color directly from 3D scan data

recognition.title: Intelligent Recognition
recognition.desc: Automatic detection, numbering, and classification of teeth

reconstruction.title: AI-driven reconstruction
reconstruction.desc: Geometry reconstruction preserving anatomy, occlusion, and proportions

philosophy.title: Development Philosophy
philosophy.description: We don't build 'everything at once'. We build exactly what has the greatest clinical and technological significance.

software.closing: We are not improving existing tools. We are designing what should exist if CAD/CAM were created today from scratch.

professionalGate.title: Content for Professionals
professionalGate.description: This site contains specialized information intended for dental professionals. By continuing, you confirm that you are a dentist or dental technician.
professionalGate.note: Site intended exclusively for dental industry specialists

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.note: Prices may vary depending on specifications and order volume

cta.title: Interested in cooperation?
cta.subtitle: Contact us to discuss details and start the digital transformation of your practice

retainers.title: Retention Splints
description: Digitally designed retention splints provide full control over the insertion path and seating stability. Unlike traditional thermoforming methods, our solution enables precise management of geometry, thickness, and retention zones.
Thanks to 3D printing with certified medical materials, we achieve significantly higher mechanical strength, translating to long-term reliability in daily use.
features: Precise retention zone geometry designed from 3D data
Controlled insertion and removal path for patient comfort
Significantly higher strength than thermoformed splints
Medical material certified for long-term contact
Predictable retention thanks to digital process control

guards.title: Occlusal Splints
description: Occlusal splints designed for maximum protection against bruxism. We use advanced CAD/CAM design to create variable material thickness – 2mm in occlusal zones for bite force absorption, and 1mm in unloaded areas for comfort.

Digitally controlled thickness zones ensure optimal load distribution and long-term tissue protection. Significantly higher material strength compared to traditional thermoforming methods guarantees a long product lifespan.
features: Variable thickness adapted to bite force distribution
Optimal load distribution in occlusal zones
Multi-fold higher durability than thermoformed splints
Increased user comfort thanks to ergonomic geometry
Material resistant to long-term mechanical loads

aligners.title: Tray Whitening Splints
aligners.tagline: Precision and comfort in whitening therapy
description: Individually designed tray whitening splints, based on precise 3D scans. Each splint is designed considering patient anatomy, ensuring a perfect fit and controlled thickness for comfort during therapy.
Optimized gel reservoirs guarantee even distribution of the whitening agent, while controlled geometry ensures predictable therapy results with minimal patient discomfort.
features: Designed from 3D scan data for a perfect fit
Controlled gel reservoirs for even whitening
Optimized wall thickness for wearing comfort
Medical material safe for oral tissues
Predictable whitening effects thanks to digital control

fixedRetainer.title: Printed Fixed Retainer
fixedRetainer.tagline: Digital precision instead of manual bending
description: Digitally designed fixed retention made using 3D printing technology with biocompatible medical resin. Each retainer is individually designed based on 3D scans, ensuring a perfect fit to the anatomy of the patient's dental arch.

Unlike traditional steel wires bent by hand on a model, our method eliminates the risk of manual errors, ensures full geometry repeatability, and controlled material strength. Biocompatible resin is characterized by high mechanical resistance and long-term retention stability.
features: CAD/CAM design from precise 3D scan data
Ultra-accurate fit to the dental arch anatomy
Predictable mechanical strength of the material
Elimination of manual wire bending variability
